did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Association is part of Cornell University Cooperative Extension.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes minutes of meetings, financials, and correspondence from 1923-1984, excluding 1926.
